name: Audi R8 Remake
preview: I reused the car model I created few years ago and tried to redo a render to show my rendering skills.
description: I reused the car model I created few years ago and tried to redo a render to show my rendering skills. I used cycles render engine with Nvidia Denoising to render out images and I did postprocessing in photoshop. Textures are designed pocedurally using substance painter and decals are created in Photoshop.
